website_summaries.verdict: For great sound quality and an over-ear design, these are a good choice.
pros: Customers love these for their big sound and over-ear design
Excellent battery life is another perk of these headphones
cons: A bit on the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: My bf had been on the search for "the perfect bluetooth headphones" (preferably over-the-ear) and had bought and tried ...
customer_reviews.text: My bf had been on the search for "the perfect bluetooth headphones" (preferably over-the-ear) and had bought and tried like 5 before these. He's pretty picky, so there was always something wrong..sound, fit, weight, look, whatever. This is his favorite pair (although it has been like a year or two now..) He has Beats, but overall, prefers these. They fit comfortably and look good. Price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Started out great...
customer_reviews.text: Started out great...But... The right channel died one month and 3 days after purchase. Amazon says "item not eligible for return"!!! Boo! Boo AMAZON!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cant Go Wrong With These! JBL FTW
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many headphones and returned so many because they didnt meet my expectations. Some much more expensive and some around the same price. These headphones not only feel great and look amazing, they sound AWESOME! the bass is not heavy yet it doesnt hide. phone calls on them are great. the bluetooth connections is so fast! the on button is the same as the bluetooth button and it just needs one tap and itll turn on and connect to the last device it was connected too. The "skip" and "back" function works flawlessly. I definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a GREAT quality feel and most importantly, SOUND.
customer_reviews.author: HernandezProduction

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a while now and like the sound quality a lot. It works nicely with my iPhone for music and calls. It is a little snug on my head which can be a little fatiguing over time but I like how it folds up a little bit to fit into my backpack. It has been crammed into my backpack but keeps it's shape and stays like new. I'm impressed with the battery life and it charges fast.
customer_reviews.author: S L.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't call this an "Over the ear" headset as it is more of a larger "On the ear" headset.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call this an "Over the ear" headset as it's more of a larger "On the ear" headset. The ear pads don't really encase or go over the ears, they basically just cover them. I also dislike their choice of charging the Bluetooth in which they use a 2.5mm plug that runs to a usb port. This is the same port that you use to listen to audio while being "wired" to what ever it is you're listening to.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 years of almost daily abuse at the gym and they work as well as the first day
customer_reviews.text: after 2 years of going to the gym 4 - 5 times a week.. the JBL E50BT still works as intended.. they still hold the charge just fine... I sweat a lot and the headphones can easily withstand the sweat.. in fact the headphone looks almost like new.. no fading or damage of the pads ... I cannot comment on the sound quality as I only listen to Death/Black Metal... LOL... but to me the sound quality is as good as the day I bought them... I am a happy customer.. I will buy again !
customer_reviews.author: CA JL Metal Head

customer_reviews.title: Performs beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a pair of proper Bluetooth headphones for a while, but I've not played with JBL quality before, so when I put my new headphones, my mind was pretty much blown. Excellent balance, makes anything I listen to sound amazing. The battery life is surprising, considering how much I use them. Since I got my them in January, I've charged them three times. I'd say it's about eighteen hours. And their connectivity is nigh unstoppable. I leave my phone in my room in the basement and I can go to the second floor of the house with no troubles. All in all, fantastic headphones, and I'm a total JBL fanboy now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough bass...but great stereo sound!
customer_reviews.text: For JBL I expected a lot more bass sound! Now I will say I'm rather impressed with the full stereo sound! When playing rock or pop songs it's great! But when you want to hear the bass in hip hop these fall short! The design of them though is amazing! They look great and you can tell are very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Ambre Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Super good quality earphones; worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loves these headphones. They are easy to sync, charge quickly, and have awesome sound and bass. They isolate noise extremely well and are good about keeping your music contained within the ear pieces. These headphones are awesome all around!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Was Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are STELLAR! Honestly, if you are looking for very good bluetooth headphones, these are it. Despite the relatively large size, it is very comfortable. Given that the drivers are rather large the base response is very good. It does revert to pairing mode every time you turn it on, but it pairs with my Note 4 immediately. Again, these are BLUETOOTH headphones and will not give the full dynamic range of a pair of very good wired headphones. But for the price and the absolute freedom from that annoying cord, I will buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: VeryOpinionated

customer_reviews.title: Rich sound, profound bass, very good.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two pair of these. Excellent sound, rich and profound bass, and, (what I found to like most), could be used with standard audio cable to listen with bypassed internal electronics if one wants to listen pure analog.
customer_reviews.author: Cedomir Maric

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great and I can wear them all day while working ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great and I can wear them all day while working and not get tired of them. I've tried about 3 other pair of Bluetooth headsets, and these blow them all out of the water. I'm a fan of House music and EDM, and these have great bass for my thump music.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Being a slight audiophile, I didn't really think these would satisfy me. However, I needed a nice pair of headphones that wouldn't get in the way at the gym while not breaking the bank. I have to say I'm quite impressed with battery life, audio quality, and the sturdiness is the product! Definitely would recommend for someone who loves nice sounding music but also has to go out often. P.S. The sound signature is a bit warm and bass heavy, but nowhere near as bad as beats.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Not actually over ear.
customer_reviews.text: These are on ear headphones, just slightly larger than average. Also, for those with larger heads (like myself), these headphones fit pretty snug but they do get uncomfortable after a bit. Aside from those couple flaws, everything else seems to be just fine. They have a very fashionable design and are pretty lightweight. As far as noise cancelation goes, they’re what you’d expect them to be, but raising the volume too high will most likely result in those around you telling you to turn it down. Pretty happy with this purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: David Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I respect JBL product. But for this headset, I got a below par product. The left side of the headset stopped working within 4months. I wasn't expecting such a failure from a JBL product. I left disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luomo

customer_reviews.title: Better then Boses in my opinion!!! Luv them
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great ! I was going to by Bose headphone until I tried them next to these JBL's! Would by again 100% Bluetooth works great although people in the office can hear my music when I have them turned way up! I guess there not really considered noise calculations in that aspect A+ all the way
customer_reviews.author: puffing tough

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to be a Replacement for the some old JBL J56BT. They have GREAT sound quality and they block out ALL sound around you. Only down side is that people around you can hear the music/movie also. Be careful on the airplane or in a crowded area and respect peoples space. Hope they fix this on the new models, I am slightly disappointed in that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are just barely 8 months old and are breaking apart and no way to repair. I would not recommend purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: R. Allen Walker

customer_reviews.title: If you are a big head person, not the headphones for you.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and Bluetooth capabilities of the headphones are great and I had no problem pairing them to both my phone and laptop....but they physically hurt my ears after an hour or so. Granted, I have a pretty big head. If you have a big melon, I would not buy these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Joe

customer_reviews.title: I can't imagine a better blue tooth headphone.
customer_reviews.text: I can't even imagine how perfect these headphones are. They sound superb; cost virtually nothing, and bring the famous JBL name and reputation. They are so great that I bought a second pair. My recommendation is to buy a 2 or 3 year extended warranty for any blue tooth headphones. There's so much technology that there is always the risk of a breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: jeff in new england

customer_reviews.title: NICE AND LOUD!!! 🥰🥳🤩🤓🎧
customer_reviews.text: It’s very true!! The bigger the drum the bigger the sound. Much better than the ear bud crud. Over the ear home theater sound!! Might buy another pair. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Art Chotipradit

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: ONE Word GREAT sound! Didnt test the longevity of batteries but it has a cord as well so not issue 4 me. Very surprised with microphone on this set sounds good not great because of location of position of mic,but good. Headphones are comfortable at least for me
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Gapa

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bass is boomey! Hurts your ears after a while! Otherwise they are easy to use and pair. Good sound and they hold a charge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality too
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. The recipient absolutely loves these. Excellent sound quality too! I had struggled with this choice because of the JBL brand and the Dr. Dre Beats. I'm glad I chose these. My son stated that these were better than the Beats he had purchased for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Shy Girl

customer_reviews.title: I treated this thing like my baby-- special hard case
customer_reviews.text: Bought it Nov 28th, 2016 March 21st (2017l it breaks on me. I treated this thing like my baby-- special hard case, delicate when I put it away. But no, it breaks almost four months to the day of getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Aideyn

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, Bluetooth and a detachable cord.
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, are rugged and have an option for a cord if needed. I use the Bluetooth with my phone and a cord for my 3DS. I have rather big ears so these are more like on ear for me. Couses me slight discomfort after an hour or so of listening. After a month of usage it has gotten more comfortable over time. If you have glasses these might make them dig into your head because they are a tight fit. I personally like how tight they are but I usually take my glasses off when using the headset for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Beggi

customer_reviews.title: Warranty that was purchased will not honor as they say I have to go after the Mfg but cannot find a good # for the Mfg
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working - loose "plug" where you plug in to phone, etc. in about 5 weeks. Warranty that was purchased will not honor as they say I have to go after the Mfg but cannot find a good # for the Mfg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ear opening is not quiet around the year therefore creating a lot of discomfort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for 3 years now and they have always been good for me. The build quality is good and have never had any issues with them. The only quips I have are they bleed music quite a bit and after prolonged use they hurt my ears. Other than that though I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Dailen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I've owned, period. The fit over-ear is comfortable and the audio is crisp and full. The bass response is impressive, but not overpowering. I'll never use earbuds again! The Bluetooth pairing is simple and easy to use - it's also reliable and works at distances exceeding 30 feet. I use these in the gym frequently and while my family is sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jzle

customer_reviews.title: Although they fit a bit as on the ear, ...
customer_reviews.text: Although they fit a bit as on the ear, and they cleverly flirted with the line of over the ear, the only problem I could find is that sometimes they can create discomfort if worn for long hrs, the key here is to be sure you are placing them on correctly, otherwise your ears will be in pain if you adjust them.
customer_reviews.author: Jael94

customer_reviews.title: these cans deliver great sound. the bass is not over powering and ...
customer_reviews.text: these cans deliver great sound. the bass is not over powering and everything just sound better on these head phones. what is stopping me from giving it a 5 is the fact that the connection it comes with are proprietary. i.e. if you lose the jack to connect it to your computer, you will need to buy one off the internet. you can't just simply get one from a dollar store. I use an iphone 4s. it connects great, I have no issues with the Bluetooth connection. if you have an android buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Amos D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones! Not as good as the pair I use for work but great for every day use. I would recommend over any headphones $200 and less. also i would stay away form beats, they are horrible pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth at gym now
customer_reviews.text: Hate using cord while on stepper or treadmill these sound great with iPhone in pocket
customer_reviews.author: william durr

customer_reviews.title: They easily seek out and connect to all my devices except ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. They easily seek out and connect to all my devices except my PS4 (the provided cable links to the controller to remedy that.) Sound quality is great and the battery life is outstanding. Strong bass response and noticeable clarity when making/taking calls. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Junk!°° #DontBuyIt
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this product. After only 4 months , the right side stopped working and they refuse to make it right. As always they require you to select at least 1 star, they should offer negative stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rick K

customer_reviews.title: Better than Most
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy product. I use these headphones throughout the work day, but they become uncomfortable after a 2 hours or so. If they were more comfortable they would be a five.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon D. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy terrible sound quality and loose fit on head! I returned it the day i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kadin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. Got them for my sister...i tried em out before giving them to her for christmas lol. pretty impressive. a lil on the lower end for the price but still impressive. a tad chincy in the plastic quality department but as long as you take care of them theyre fine. love the bluetooth and sound quality. perfect for what she needed them for
customer_reviews.author: Hubbs

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent headphones for the price. Very easy to operate and they look and sound fantastic...just what I was looking for. The only reason I rated it three stars is due to JBL compromising comfort. The ear cushoins are very rigid and will start to become very uncomfortable after a very short while. This was a critical element that I expected from JBL and they did not come through regarding this model.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMFORTABLE at all
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT over-ear headphones the pads rest on your ears. If you can get your ear inside the pads then the plastic of the speaker grill press firmly against your ear. NOT COMFORTABLE at all. Returned them within an hour of receiving them.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Rader

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The right ear is not working anymore after 3 months of light use. It's Garbage
customer_reviews.author: FREDDY MALDONADO

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to workout at the gym. I've had it less than 3 months and the sound went out in the right ear piece. The battery is now giving out sooner. Nice for a couple of months, but it's time to uograde
customer_reviews.author: Qawi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years bluetooth just quit working. Battery life kept getting shorter and shorter between charges.These were not used a lot so think they should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: robert Wood

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about 6 months really nice headphones until the head band broke already
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Colson

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews and was a little tense even though the reviews were good overall. The first tune i put on was ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I read the reviews and was a little tense even though the reviews were good overall. The first tune i put on was David Gilmours Shine on you Crazy Diamond live in Gdansk. Crisp throughout the range, they sound better than i anticipated. Theyre brand new so they will only get better. No issues with the bluetooth. Theyre a little stiff...as they should be when new. Plenty loud, they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: brian p eilert

customer_reviews.title: These work great! I read other reviews before buying and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I read other reviews before buying and they have worked perfectly for me so far. The sound quality is very good and they are comfortable. I use them for listening to music for drum practice and the volume range goes from very low to very high.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Becker

customer_reviews.title: JBL performance.
customer_reviews.text: These JBL headphones perform as any product with the JBL logo imprinted on them should... Plenty of power and thump..as well as a flat frequency response across the dynamic range.
customer_reviews.author: Dano Banano

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice bass and sound
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice bass and sound. My only complaint is that they don't fit my ears (pretty normal size) very well. Definitely not over ear headphones.The Bluetooth connection works like a charm and the controls on the cup are easy and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Díaz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is 5 stars. Quality is 3 stars and you can feel it way before they eventually snap.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones and you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones and you can't beat the price. Bluetooth works flawlessly and the sound quality is very good. They have good bass without being too bass heavy like Beats. My only complaint is they start to fatigue after a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: SirAric

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth functionality is great and have good
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are too rigid. The ear cups takes around 1-2 weeks to become soft after continuous use and the headband is very rigid not at all flexible. Bluetooth functionality is great and have good range
customer_reviews.author: Abhimanyu

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 76-year old mother. Was dreading helping her getting it set up by phone but I was pleasantly surprised. It was easy to set up and use and she is now using them on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: RAJ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: I have a headphone addiction, so naturally when I saw these, I fell in love. Bluetooth headphones for about $100 I had to try them, the bass isn't what I wanted it to be but still 5 star headphones, the loss of the star occurred when I noticed the cable was not in fact a standard 3.5mm to a 3.5mm, it is a 3.5 to a 2.5 this is not a huge deal but it was enough for me to take off a star
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and easy to sync
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and easy to sync, but the control warning "beep" when you reach the highest volume setting is really loud. The different wired accessories being proprietary is annoying. You really need to keep that charing wire safe. The battery life is amazing, so it isn't a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like a Toyota engine in a Ferrari
customer_reviews.text: If the look of these headphones played a substantial part in you buying them, then you'll get just that. However, if you're looking for premium quality sound, I would certainly not recommend these (at least not for the price). You can certainly get this kind of sound quality for tens of dollars less.
customer_reviews.author: Leonhard

customer_reviews.title: Way better than my first gen beats
customer_reviews.text: Makes beat by dre look stupid they might not have as much bass but the Long life battery and wireless are so bomb I walked out of my work around a corner and still connected and I've tried to kill the battery and can't will deft buy again
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: These Speakers are great, having bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: These Speakers are great, having bluetooth, with mic, and cord available option is awesome. they stay charged for a really long time. plan on getting a pair for the wife at somepoint.
customer_reviews.author: Aundre J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound reproduction. Comfortable. Excellent battery life. Almost instant on/off; much faster than my other Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Fragilistic

customer_reviews.title: BlueTooth/Wireless Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are a little uncomforable after hours of use; but the wireless works great. I would recomend this to anyone who is looking for wireless headphones that don't mind the mild discomfort or have small ears!
customer_reviews.author: BeachBookLover

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: A tad heavy. Over-ear size fits great but still causes soreness after hours of wearing/using. Not so good for work/long wear situations. Sounds great when plugged in with audio cable. Bluetooth audio quality leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat's Meow

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for high ...
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for high quality Bluetooth headphones. They last the 18hrs that was discribed.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Sound great! easy hookup
customer_reviews.text: Sound great! easy hookup. had to read what button did but after that worked great on everything including iMac .
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: very good sound quality! easy to connect by Bluetooth. however, hard on ears after 1 hour of continued use. it probably depends on the size of your head, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Alain

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good hp. Deep bass, clear sound and spacious. My favourite so far since they are also very light. However 2.5mm cable was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Tacsan Ch

customer_reviews.title: Better out there...
customer_reviews.text: As big as they are, the didn't fit my head. Enjoyable sound, but didn't keep noise in very well; I don't like when people around can hear me when I'm not even blasting.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Z

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit is terrible. Not sure if it's the earpads - gonna try to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Castor Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome earphone. Great sound. Great look just awesome. The only thing that I don't like is the fact that it is not fully an over the ear head set. So after an hour or two your ear will start hurting. Luckly my ears got use to it so I'm good now. Awesome sound.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo Ali Bocanegra

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones a little pricy for me
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones a little pricy for me. I had to return them cause with my as I call them elven ears they would hurt my ears so I saw no point in having them sit around and do nothing. Good sound though and a really nice pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Chase Piskacek

customer_reviews.title: Too big it looks weird
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but it is too big! It makes you look like an astronaut. I didn't like it
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo H.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these after a year and half almost daily use ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these after a year and half almost daily use in gym.great synch oprion others don't have. Durable, comfortable, long lasting battery
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another great product by JBL. Rich full sound, very compfortable to wear and works good with phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Reynoldson

customer_reviews.title: Half and half
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect Bluetooth, then the left ear didn't work.. All troubleshooting attempted, so I returned them due to defects. The right ear sounded amazing but it would be nice to use both ears!!
customer_reviews.author: nocturnaljam78

customer_reviews.title: JBL E50BT Black Premium Wireless over the Ear
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Great sound and awesome price. Bluetooth and auxillary helps out
customer_reviews.author: Big Spray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its great good sound but there is no bag whit it and i think it should have bag
customer_reviews.author: Majid

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones great price
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones great price. May hear sounds outside of headphones but for the most part headphones allow you to be In your own music environment
customer_reviews.author: Pepperseven

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! I am so happy I bought these ...
customer_reviews.text: Luxury! Great sound! I am so happy I bought these over Beats. Better price and look.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: We are music people and use the headphones where ever ...
customer_reviews.text: We are music people and use the headphones where ever we go. We've had many top of the line headphones and by far, this is my number one choice without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for!
customer_reviews.text: Very proud owner of this beauty, is getting dirty very easy but is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Seli Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Bad material quality
customer_reviews.text: The ear covers are broken now. I bought it on April 23, 2018. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastián Morales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my "BLUE" JBL headphones. I wear them while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Nobleblue32

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones. Do get uncomfortable on the ears after a couple hours, though. And kinda heavy.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and they were $200 cheaper than another JVC model he had his eye on
customer_reviews.author: Frederick S.

customer_reviews.title: My son thinks I bought him $500 headphones
customer_reviews.text: WOWSERS! The sound is incredible from these. My son thinks I bought him $500 headphones. The build quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M Martens

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great! but one main issue.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I dont like about these headphones is the aux cable and port is 2.5 instead of 3.5. And the cable that comes in the box has no mic on it. So if you're using the headset with the cable, u lose the mic capabilities. Hopefully the adapter I ordered works and fixes this prob so I can use my own aux w/mic cable. Outside of that, they sound great!!!
customer_reviews.author: DUJUAN HAMMONDS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Wish I had gotten it in black though as the white is hard to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Angela D Correia Savage

customer_reviews.title: Good sound using iPhone and galaxy "that's what I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound using iPhone and galaxy "that's what I tried on" Finishing is ok but not the best comparing with other JBL headphones I tried it on laptop but the sound was afoul
customer_reviews.author: Osama Hallaq

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality, and really great sound. Why I am rating two stars you may ask? Well, the left headphone broke within 2 weeks. I made sure to keep it from breaking, I took all he precautions and regardless it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Truly great sound. Wish the volume went higher.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the Wireless Over-Ear headphones. The sound is fantastic, and the outer noise is nearly non-existent.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound and long lasting battery. Quick charge time. Sounds way better than the Beets.
customer_reviews.author: GunPilot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounds, I purchase them for working out in ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sounds, I purchase them for working out in the fitness center...good battery life and not to loud..fits over the ear...
customer_reviews.author: Larry Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality not very good!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit and great color, but wasn't as loud as Beats or as good a sound! You get what you pay for I guess! I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: VJGBK31

customer_reviews.title: a little disappoint with this
customer_reviews.text: a little disappoint with this, i thought such a big headphone can instead my beats studio wireless. The bass is not good. high and mid is ok. a little better than beats. however rightnow i only listen electric and hiphop. i need bass! Less bass than the Bluetooth earbud i bought on amazon. also, the sound is not loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift for my husband. He loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband. He loves them. He uses them almost everyday and only charges them once every 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Aw3s0m3

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One speaker went out disappointed ....1 1/2 month inn...past the return deadline...not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not working after just four weeks. Poor build quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: They were great for the first month but now I've lost sound through the right ear. I guess I'll try and get them repaired under warranty, but for the money I expect better build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rowe

customer_reviews.title: good headphones, bad cable
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. The coolest thing is being able to connect multiple devices at the same time. You can switch between your phone and laptop without having to reconnect either one. The one drawback is that it has a unique charging cable so if you lose it you're out of luck
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Cheeply made hurts your ears
customer_reviews.text: Cheeply made hurts your ears cause the ear cups don't have enough padding.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L. Sutphen

customer_reviews.title: Glad I picked these as my birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Comfortable to wear for several hours. I can answer my phone via Bluetooth with them. I love that I can use them wired or wireless.
customer_reviews.author: MMMJS

product_meta.title: JBL E50BT Black Premium Wireless Over-Ear Bluetooth Stereo Headphone, Black
product_meta.description: Bask your ears in bold JBL sound: large 50mm drivers with PureBass Performance envelop your ears, delivering an expansive soundstage with clarity and precision. Bluetooth technology allows wireless connectivity with your smart devices, with single-button access to enabling a pure connection to your wireless device for clear hands free calling. Integrated Share Me lets you take your music social, allowing you to stream music wirelessly to another Share Me equipped headphone. And a built-in rechargeable Li-ion battery keeps the sound going with 18 hours of uninterrupted play time. The ergonomic headband and 3D hinges provide for long lasting comfort. Soft, leatherette ear cups cradle your ears for all-day comfort while providing a heightened level of passive noise reduction. The E50BT's sleek design and five unique color combinations make a visual statement that's as striking its sound.
feature_bullets: JBL signature sound with PureBass performance and premium 50mm drivers deliver full spectrum sound with uninhibited clarity and powerful bass. Connectivity Technology: Wireless
Bluetooth enabled technology for wireless calling and music play. Built-in Share Me technology allows you to share your content with another set of headphones, simultaneously
Ear-cup-based microphone with echo-cancelation technology allows for hands-free calling with a pure connection to your wireless device for clear, hands free calling
Built-in, USB rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides 16 hours of uninterrupted listening. And when the battery dies, the included aux cable allows for passive listening
Ergonomic headband and protein leather ear-cushions provide an ultra-comfortable fit and effective noise isolation
